extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite    Level 2 or above.
Exclusion    No more than 1 course from HIST213; HIST240; HIST253

basic.description: An introduction to the history of social welfare and public policy in Western Europe and North America. Topics include health care and public assistance; employment, pension and education policy; economic and urban planning. A major theme of the course is the emergence and development of civil, political, economic and social 'rights'.
basic.subject: HIST
basic.title: History of Public Policy
